SALESFORCE HELP

VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
CloudCraze Release Notes

Review the archived release notes from legacy CloudCraze versions.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Salesforce CompatibilitySalesforce not available in all orgs) and Lightning Experience for Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions.


B2B Commerce Compatibility

Any org installing or upgrading to CloudCraze 4.8 or earlier

This content is available only as archived PDFs from CloudCraze documentation:

IMPORTANT The PDF content was authored for older versions of the managed package and doesn't necessarily represent the most recent version of B2B Commerce for Visualforce. This content is updated infrequently, and only for resolving critical inaccuracies or changes in behavior.
